title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Strategies Through Student Volunteer Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Program for language domain beginners, strengthening real-life language application skills through community-linked service activities

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize over 20 essential foreign language expressions required in volunteer activities through case analysis.
Learners can improve communication skills by participating in role-playing practices based on volunteer scenarios at least three times weekly via mobile learning modules.
By the end of the program, over 80% of learners will be able to create and present volunteer plans while concretizing goal-setting.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
